email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Smith,

We are looking to charter a vessel for a shipment of 150,000MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Qingdao on CIF terms. Please provide a quote and vessel availability for a laycan of October 10-15.

Best regards,
James Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Lee,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel MV OCEAN HORIZON, DWT 180,000, LOA 290m, for your cargo. The rate is USD 25 per MT. Laycan is October 10-15. Demurrage is USD 20,000 per day. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Andrew Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Smith,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Can you revise the rate to USD 22 per MT? Also, can you confirm the loading window?

Best regards,
James Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Lee,

Given the current market conditions, I can offer a revised rate of USD 23 per MT. The loading window is 72 hours. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Andrew Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Smith,

USD 23 per MT is acceptable. Please proceed with the booking and send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
James Lee

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Lee,

Thank you for confirming. Attached is the charter party for your review. Please let me know if any adjustments are needed.

Best regards,
Andrew Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Smith,

The charter party looks good. We will proceed as discussed. Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
James Lee
